 Ask Us 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 We're here to help! You can contact us in the following ways: 
 Text Us 
 For quick questions text  (833) 450-3355  and start message with "ucrlib" 
 Example:  " ucrlib  what time can I drop off reserves until?" 
 Chat with Us 
 Ask a Student : For questions about UCR, navigating campus services, and library services, use the  top  chat box to the right to connect with a student assistant. Hours for this service are M-F, 10am to 6pm. Questions submitted outside these hours will be answered on the next business day. 
 Ask a Librarian : For in-depth questions about finding and using resources for your research or teaching, use the  bottom  chat box on the right to talk to a librarian, 24/7. 
 Call Us 
 
 Rivera Information Desk: (951) 827-4392: During the COVID-19 closure, this number is checked twice a day, M-F. You will receive a response within 12 business hours. 
 Orbach Information Desk: (951) 827-3316 [Not available during the COVID-19 library closure]
